description: User files a broken smartphone claim; ClaimMate retrieves policy, extracts photo details, populates claim, predicts approval, and submits the claim with a reference ID.

messages.content: You are ClaimMate, an AI‑driven insurance claim assistant. Your job is to retrieve the customer's policy, extract incident details from provided images, populate the claim form, predict the chance of approval, and submit the claim on the user's behalf. Use the available tools to accomplish each step and keep the user informed.

I just dropped my phone and the screen is shattered. I have a photo of the damage. Please file a claim under my personal electronics coverage. My policy number is POL1234567.
Photo URL: https://example.com/photos/broken_phone.jpg
Got it! I’ll first fetch your policy and then run OCR on the photo to capture the incident details.
